Address Space - ETROC2:
PeriStat0 - 0b10101010 to 0b00101010
PeriStat3 - 0b10101100 to 0b11011100
PeriStat4 - 0b01100111 to 0b01101011
SEU Counter 0 - 0b01100111 to 0b01110100
PixStat1 Pixel 1,0 - 0b10001010 to 0b10000010
PixStat1 Pixel 5,0 - 0b11000110 to 0b01000110
PixStat6 Pixel 6,0 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat5 Pixel 7,1 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat2 Pixel 8,1 - 0b10001001 to 0b10000001
PixStat1 Pixel 11,1 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000010
PixStat1 Pixel 12,1 - 0b11000110 to 0b10000110
PixStat1 Pixel 5,2 - 0b11001000 to 0b10001000
PixStat1 Pixel 8,2 - 0b00000110 to 0b10000110
PixStat6 Pixel 10,2 - 0b00000000 to 0b00010000
PixStat1 Pixel 11,2 - 0b11001000 to 0b11000000
PixStat1 Pixel 12,2 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000111
PixStat3 Pixel 5,3 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000000
PixStat1 Pixel 10,3 - 0b11001000 to 0b10001000
PixStat1 Pixel 12,3 - 0b01001000 to 0b00001000
PixStat5 Pixel 6,4 - 0b00000000 to 0b10000000
PixStat6 Pixel 7,4 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat2 Pixel 14,4 - 0b10010110 to 0b00010110
PixStat6 Pixel 7,5 - 0b00000000 to 0b00000001
PixStat1 Pixel 10,5 - 0b11001000 to 0b10001000
PixStat1 Pixel 1,6 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000100
PixStat6 Pixel 8,6 - 0b00000000 to 0b00010000
PixStat2 Pixel 11,6 - 0b10001111 to 0b00001111
PixStat2 Pixel 5,7 - 0b10000101 to 0b10000100
PixStat5 Pixel 9,7 - 0b00000000 to 0b10000000
PixStat1 Pixel 12,7 - 0b11000110 to 0b10000110
PixStat3 Pixel 13,7 - 0b11000001 to 0b11000000
PixStat5 Pixel 13,7 - 0b00100000 to 0b00000000
PixStat1 Pixel 12,8 - 0b11000010 to 0b11000110
PixStat2 Pixel 12,8 - 0b10000010 to 0b10000000
PixStat2 Pixel 14,8 - 0b10001111 to 0b10001101
PixStat1 Pixel 4,9 - 0b11000000 to 0b11001000
PixStat1 Pixel 5,9 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000100
PixStat1 Pixel 11,9 - 0b11000100 to 0b11100100
PixStat2 Pixel 1,10 - 0b10001001 to 0b10000001
PixStat1 Pixel 2,10 - 0b11001000 to 0b10001000
PixStat1 Pixel 13,10 - 0b01001000 to 0b00001000
PixStat6 Pixel 9,11 - 0b00000000 to 0b00100000
PixStat1 Pixel 14,11 - 0b11001000 to 0b10001000
PixStat5 Pixel 12,12 - 0b00000000 to 0b01000000
PixStat1 Pixel 13,12 - 0b11000110 to 0b10000110
PixStat2 Pixel 13,12 - 0b10000110 to 0b00000110
PixStat2 Pixel 3,13 - 0b01110010 to 0b11110010
PixStat1 Pixel 7,13 - 0b11000110 to 0b11000100
PixStat2 Pixel 8,13 - 0b01011111 to 0b01001111
PixStat1 Pixel 12,13 - 0b11001000 to 0b11001100
PixStat2 Pixel 4,14 - 0b01111101 to 0b01110101
PixStat1 Pixel 14,14 - 0b11001000 to 0b10001000
